channel.description: Building world-class software, teams, and products.

item.title: Test Driven Development with Xcode
item.author: Alex Tamoykin
item.description:
Test Driven Development is a great way to take your code to a whole another level. In this presentation, we’ll talk about what is TDD, why TDD is awesome and how to do it in Xcode using Swift and XCTest

Here is the link to a Video Recording

and Slides


Presented at CocoaHeads LA – Testing Edition

Enjoy,

Alex
